text: What action do you see going on in that picture? Well, I see the mother washing dishes. See the water blowing out of the sink top. See the boy on a stool that's about to tilt. He's trying to get into the cookie jar. Little girl has her hand out for a cookie. long silence water is running . dishes are on the same time .. it is off the cookie jar .. let me tell you the grass is growing . I can tell you the water is spilling out of the sink on the floor. . Look at the, we've been doing it to see the outside
